validator.number: This field must be a number
validator.password: This field must be a valid password
validator.password_min_length: Password must contain at least {length: int} characters
validator.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validator.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validator.password_special_chars: Password must contain at least one special character
validator.password_numbers: Password must contain at least one number
validator.email: This field must be an email address
validator.alpha_numeric: This field must have only numbers/letters
validator.matches: This field must be the same as the {field: String} field
validator.exact_length: This field must have exactly {length: int} characters
validator.min_length: This field must have at least {length: int} characters
validator.max_length: This field must have at most {length: int} characters
